alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued February 23 at 6:33AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 8 AM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from Minor flooding resulting from heavy rain moving over the islands. WHERE...Tutuila-Aunuu-Manua- WHEN...Through 8 am. IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Surface trough lingering over the islands is bringing occasional heavy rainfall over the islands. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 633 AM TAEAO ASO LULU FEPUARI 23 2022 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 8 AM... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa o lo`o gasolo mai i luga o le atunu`u. NOFOAGA...Tutuila-Aunuu-Manua- TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 8 am. AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o lo`o lata mai i le atunu`u o lo`o mafua ai timuga mamafa i luga o le atunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.
